name: Maria Lopez
learned: Maria Lopez is a student at Oak Hill College studying physics and a part time Twitch game streamer who loves to connect with people and explore new ideas.
currently: Status: Maria Lopez successfully attended her appointment for the Physics and Social Justice Project with Klaus Mueller at Oak Hill College on Wednesday, February 15 at 3:00 PM. She arrived on time and fully prepared, ready to delve into the important collaborative work exploring the impact of physics on social justice issues. Maria's passion for this project was evident as she engaged in insightful discussions and brainstorming sessions with Klaus. She felt fulfilled knowing she was making a positive contribution to both fields. Maria also continued to prioritize education, creativity, and unforgettable experiences in her academic and social endeavors, feeling grateful for the opportunities to pursue her interests.
lifestyle: Maria Lopez goes to bed around 2am, awakes up around 9am, eats dinner around 6pm. She likes to hang out at Hobbs Cafe if it's before 6pm.
